topic.title: Customizing WebHelp Output using a WebHelp Publishing Template

body.draft-comment: Add some paragraphs that expose why it is better to use this method. WHY?
body.p: Using a WebHelp Publishing Template to customize your output is the recommended customization method.

We recommend this method because a publishing template package is self-contained. The customization is packed in a ZIP archive that can be shared with your team. Also, using this customization method allows you easily update to a new version of .
